meanings.definition: Those who indulge in excessive amounts of something, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The surfeiters at the buffet had plates piled high with food.
meanings.sent2: The surfeiters at the party couldn't resist the tempting desserts.
meanings.sent3: The surfeiters at the picnic were like hungry bears raiding a beehive.
meanings.sent4: The surfeiters devoured the snacks like a swarm of locusts.
meanings.sent5: The image of the surfeiters feasting will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: To consume or indulge in something to excess.
meanings.sent1: She surfeiters on chocolate whenever she feels stressed.
meanings.sent2: He surfeiters on social media late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The cat surfeiters on catnip and then naps for hours.
meanings.sent4: The student surfeiters on information before the exam.
meanings.sent5: The plant surfeiters on sunlight, growing tall and strong.
